message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SI. 

The paper focuses on community question answering (CQA) systems and proposes a model that takes into account both Q&A semantics and multi-facet domain effects (i.e., topic effects and timeliness) for answer selection and ranking. This suggests that the paper could belong to several arXiv CS sub-categories, including Computational Linguistics (cs.CL) for its focus on natural language processing, Information Retrieval (cs.IR) for its emphasis on ranking and retrieval of relevant information, Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) for its use of deep learning techniques, Machine Learning (cs.LG) for its development of a unified model, and Social and Information Networks (cs.SI) for its focus on community-based systems.
